description: Huehuetenango sits in the western highlands of Guatemala, bordering Mexico. It was one of the most ethnically diverse regions in Guatemala, and coffee growing has a rich, deep history and ties to the land. This variety is a proven, popular coffee you shouldn't miss! Cupping Notes: Maple, orange, milk chocolate and fruit notes; syrupy body, juicy acidity; sweet and complex.Try before you stock up with a 1/2 pound sample!
